attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Coordinated Pack
attacks.effect: For each of your Benched Houndour, search your deck for a Basic {D} Energy card and attach it to that Houndour. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Focus Fangs
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Punishing Scissors
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon in play that has an Ability.

attacks.name: Spinning Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Scalding Block
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Mountain Hurl
attacks.effect: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Lightning Rampage
attacks.effect: If your Benched Pokémon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Healing Pheromone
attacks.effect: Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Phantom Queen
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

abilities.name: Dust Field
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon. If they have 4 or more Benched Pokémon, they discard Benched Pokémon until they have 3 Pokémon on the Bench. If more than one effect changes the number of Benched Pokémon allowed, use the smaller number.

attacks.name: Poisonous Gem
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Cursed Slug
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 3 or fewer cards in their hand, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Infernal Reign
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Darkness
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Tune-Up
abilities.effect: This Pokémon may have up to 4 Pokémon Tools attached to it. If it loses this Ability, discard Pokémon Tools from it until only 1 remains.

attacks.name: Wild Drift
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Quick Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Quick Search Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Blustery Wind
attacks.effect: You may discard a Stadium in play.

cards.name: Geeta
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. During this turn, your Pokémon can't attack. (This includes Pokémon that come into play this turn.)

cards.name: Ortega
cards.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you choose a card you find there and put it on the bottom of their deck. If you put a card on the bottom of your opponent's deck in this way, your opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Poppy
cards.effect: Move up to 2 Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Ryme
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards. Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Scalding Block
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Infernal Reign
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.effect: This Pokémon may have up to 4 Pokémon Tools attached to it. If it loses this Ability, discard Pokémon Tools from it until only 1 remains.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Quick Search Ability each turn.

attacks.effect: You may discard a Stadium in play.

cards.name: Geeta
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. During this turn, your Pokémon can't attack. (This includes Pokémon that come into play this turn.)

cards.effect: Move up to 2 Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Darkness
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

cards.name: Artazon
cards.effect: Once during each player's turn, that player may search their deck for a Basic Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box and put it onto their Bench. Then, that player shuffles their deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
